OOC: Skullgrin is with us is he not?

CLANG, as Astroblast and Triggerhappy collide. "Arrgh, finally, 
now get in and make sure the prisoner has no chance to escape 
when Menasor puts him/her in," says Astroblast after Triggerhappy 
runs into him. "Hurry up Menasor, p-u-t   t-h-e   b-o-t   y-o-u   a-r-e   
h-o-l-d-i-n-g   i-n-t-o   m-y   s-t-o-r-a-g-e   c-o-m-p-a-r-t-m-e-n-t!"


On 21 Feb 2001, at 22:13, dcoburn wrote:

> ::Skullgrin/Triggerhappy::
> 
>         Skullgrin was blinded by the flash bomb, and then the sword rammed
> back at him right in the face, and knocked him down backwords.  However,
> when he was falling, he held onto the sword, and swung it around to try and
> fling Hot Rod off.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Triggerhappy sees the flash bomb coming but he runs into Astroblast,
> and has his gun ready to blast Condor if she(he?) made an attempt to escape.
> And for extra guard, Triggerhappy let Blowpipe go to the other end and have
> his lasers pointed on Condor.
> 
> 
>
